#summary Short general readme
#labels readme
= Readme =

This is LBOS-FRI general project repository of Little Bitty Operating System, developed by [http://www.fri.uni-lj.si/en/ Faculty of Computer and Information Science], [http://www.uni-lj.si/en/ University of Ljubljana], 3rd grade students.

Code is written for ARM (a RISC microprocessor) AT91SAM9260, using [http://www.isystem.si/ WinIDEA].


[http://code.google.com/p/lbos-fri/source/browse/trunk/README.txt General source code readme] consisting of memory mapping, system call interface, macros, context switches, references, ...

[http://code.google.com/p/lbos-fri/source/browse/trunk/CODING_STANDARD.txt Minimal coding standard] is what you need to follow

*Up to date* [http://code.google.com/p/lbos-fri/wiki/TODO TODO list] is where you pick assignments

[http://code.google.com/p/lbos-fri/source/browse/#svn/trunk Trunk source code] is what compiles and executes fine, prints a few messages, switches between tasks, switches LED, etc.

[http://code.google.com/p/lbos-fri/source/browse/#svn/branches Branches source] is where groups test their code before being merged into trunk.
